description: Detects loading and execution of an unsigned thor scanner binary.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: Other legitimate binaries named "thor.exe" that aren't published by Nextron Systems
name: Suspicious Unsigned Thor Scanner Execution
query: (event.action:(/[Ii][Mm][Aa][Gg][Ee]\ [Ll][Oo][Aa][Dd][Ee][Dd]\ \([Rr][Uu][Ll][Ee]\:\ [Ii][Mm][Aa][Gg][Ee][Ll][Oo][Aa][Dd]\)/ OR /[Ll][Oo][Aa][Dd]/) AND (process.executable:(/.*\\[Tt][Hh][Oo][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Tt][Hh][Oo][Rr]64\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) AND ((dll.path:(/.*\\[Tt][Hh][Oo][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Tt][Hh][Oo][Rr]64\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)) OR (file.path:(/.*\\[Tt][Hh][Oo][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Tt][Hh][Oo][Rr]64\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)))) AND (NOT (winlog.event_data.Signed:true AND SignatureStatus:valid AND winlog.event_data.Signature:/[Nn][Ee][Xx][Tt][Rr][Oo][Nn]\ [Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm][Ss]\ [Gg][Mm][Bb][Hh]/)))
